c:facetType.name: DataPartVisualRolesFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the data part visual roles facet.

c:property.name: dataPart
c:property.c:documentation:
The dataPart visual role allows fine grained partitioning of the data that shows in the main plot and in the second plot.
By default, data is partitioned into two data parts according to the chart's plot2Series option (depending on the chart, <c:link to="pvc.options.charts.BarChartOptions#plot2Series", or <c:link to="pvc.options.charts.PointChartCommonOptions#plot2Series").
The dataPart visual role can be bound to a single dimension that is, or is turned into, discrete.
The dataPart visual role automatically binds to a dimension whose name has the dataPart prefix.
The datums with the fixed data part value 0 are shown in the chart's main plot. The datums with the fixed data part value 1 are shown in the chart's second plot.
See for more information on supported data types.
